name: ODIN SLAYER (LOWREZJAM 2020)
description:
A grindy action-rpg  about killing Vikings.

Sail around England challenging Vikings to duels. Kill them to get gold. Use the gold to increase your stats. Track down Odin and kill him to beat the game!

CONTROLS

Map

Up / Down  - Move Ship Forward/Backward

Left/Right - Turn Ship

Z - Interact

X - View Stats

Combat

Up / Down  - Walk Forward/Backward

Left - Sword Attack

Right (Hold)  - Block

X - Shoot Arrow

Z (Hold) - Flee

Store

Left / Right  -  Choose Item

X - Purchase
